items.sentence: Tom takes a walk with Mary and her dog every day.
You might want to change into some clean clothes.
You never mentioned how beautiful your sister is.
You never really wanted to go to Boston, did you?
You should do all you can to help your neighbors.
They prefer a hotel that is close to the airport.
This looks a lot like the watch Tom used to wear.
This tastes a lot better than what I usually eat.
Tickets are $30 for adults and children are free.
Tom almost forgot his umbrella at the restaurant.
Tom and Mary are both still single, aren\'t they?
I heard that Tom doesn\'t live in Boston anymore.
Let\'s not discuss this in front of the children.
It might\'ve been Tom who sent you these flowers.
Tom bet me thirty dollars Mary wouldn\'t do that.
Tom met many other artists when he was in Boston.
Tom might have to stay here for a couple of days.
Tom bought a pair of black dress shoes yesterday.
Tom budgeted three hundred dollars for the party.
Tom called Mary every bad name he could think of.
